definition: Hatoyama, Japanese name and place name/Hatoyama Yukio (1947-), Japanese Democratic Party politician, prime minister 2009-2010
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Hatoyama Yukio (1947-), Japanese Democratic Party politician, prime minister 2009-2010

sentences.english: To originate in hair Zhuozhang Hatoyama, to the east, into the Yellow River.
sentences.chinese: 浊漳河就发源于发鸠山，向东流去，注入黄河。

sentences.english: Prosecutors said they wouldn't indict Mr. Hatoyama due to insufficient evidence.
sentences.chinese: 检察官说因为证据不足，不会起诉鸠山由纪夫。

sentences.english: The prime minister of japan changed again this week.
sentences.chinese: 本周日本首相再度易人，鸠山下台，菅直人上台。

sentences.english: Much of the responsibility for the mess belongs with Mr Hatoyama.
sentences.chinese: 鸠山对这一混乱的局面负有很大的责任。

sentences.english: Hatoyama said he was glad to see constant progress in the Japan-China relationship.
sentences.chinese: 鸠山由纪夫对日中关系不断取得进展感到高兴。

sentences.english: He also had a smooth first meeting with Barack Obama in America last week.
sentences.chinese: 上周，鸠山也已与奥巴马波澜不惊的在美国会面。

sentences.english: Although, Prime Minister Yukio Hatoyama of Japan did get pancakes.
sentences.chinese: 不过，日本首相鸠山由纪夫享受了煎饼的美味。

sentences.english: Hatoyama said he came up with the idea himself.
sentences.chinese: 鸠山说开咖啡厅是他自己的点子。

sentences.english: Mrs. Hatoyama says even after becoming prime minister, her husband still does the dishes.
sentences.chinese: 鸠山幸说，即便在担任首相后，她的丈夫也会洗碗。

sentences.english: Before the talks, Hatoyama hosted a welcome ceremony for Wen.
sentences.chinese: 会谈前，鸠山首相为温家宝举行了欢迎仪式。

sentences.english: She met the U. S. -educated Yukio while living in America.
sentences.chinese: 居住在美国期间，她结识了有美国教育背景的鸠山。

sentences.english: When she awoke, Japan's next first lady wrote, she told her now ex-husband that she had just been to Venus.
sentences.chinese: 鸠山美由纪写到，醒来后她告诉前夫她刚刚去过金星。

sentences.english: She arrived in Shanghai Friday following talks with Japanese Prime Minister Yukio Hatoyama.
sentences.chinese: 她在与日本首相鸠山由纪夫会谈后于星期五抵达上海。

sentences.english: The Japanese prime minister, Yukio Hatoyama, is to resign, he said today.
sentences.chinese: 日本首相鸠山由纪夫今天表示他将辞去首相职务。

definition: Koizumi (name)/KOIZUMI Jun'ichirō, Japanese LDP politician, prime minister 2001-2006
Hatoyama Yukio (1947-), Japanese Democratic Party politician, prime minister 2009-2010
Noda Yoshihiko, Prime Minister of Japan (2 September 2011 ~)
KOIZUMI Jun'ichirō (1942-), Japanese LDP politician, prime minister 2001-2006
Abe Shinzo (1954-), Japanese LDP politician, prime minister 2006-2007 and from 2012
FUKUDA Yasuo (1936-), Japanese LDP politician, prime minister 2007-2008
Ishihara Jintarō (1932-), Japanese author and politician, governor of Tokyo since 1999
